title: 1907 SGC 6 Wolverine News Schaefer & O'Leary Detroit Tigers Postcard Double Play
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 1907 SGC 6 Wolverine News Schaefer & O'Leary Detroit Tigers Postcard Double Play
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice SGC 6, 1907 Wolverine News Postcard of Schaeffer and O'Leary "working double play". . The two player pose has always been a highlight of this early Detroit Tigers Postcard series. 
Shipping with tracking is free with Paypal friends and family
The price is 249.00 sold
